about_the_game:
Space Dream is a Virtual Reality Music Visualizer that immerses you in a stunning work of art, a celestial world that pulses with life.
Abandoning traditional gameplay for a purely aesthetic experience, the Space Dream Demo interfaces with music from any source; pulsating to the frequencies of sound.
Rather than defining itself as a ‘game’ or a ‘music visualizer’, Space Dream combines elements from both worlds to produce an entirely new genre of interactive entertainment.

Features:

  • Fly through space with Rocket propelled Hands!
  • Automatically visualize any music playing on your PC!
  • Full walkthrough Tutorial
  • Teleportation mode for motion sickness
  • Ride the Galaxy tour through Saturns Asteroid belt
  • Trillions of blades of grass, a six-hundred-thousand particle galaxy, and ultra detailed textures on every surface.
  • Keyboard, Gamepad, HTC Vive & Oculus Rift Support!

Available for Arcades on SpringboardVR
